brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of the study is to evaluate the acute effect of a standardized extract of KRG
      (Rg3-KRG) consisting of 30% total ginsenosides, including 10% Rg3 ginsenoside on arterial
      stiffness and blood pressure, as measured by the following parameters: aortic augmentation
      index, peripheral blood pressure, central blood pressure

clinical_study.brief_title: Korean Red Ginseng Rg3 Extract on Arterial Stiffness and Blood Pressure

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Healthy

          -  Age 18-70 years

          -  BMI < 30 kg/m2

          -  Brachial systolic blood pressure < 140 mmHg

          -  Brachial diastolic blood pressure < 90 mmHg

        Main Exclusion Criteria:

          -  BMI >30kg/m2

          -  Hypertensive (brachial systolic BP ≥140mmHg and/or diastolic BP ≥90mmHg)

          -  Pregnancy

facility.name: Risk Factor Modification Centre, St. Michael's Hospital

clinical_study.official_title: Acute Effect of Rg3-enriched Korean Red Ginseng (Steamed Panax Ginseng C.A. Meyer) Standardized Extract on Arterial Stiffness and Aortic and Brachial Blood Pressure in Healthy Individuals

other_outcome.measure: To evaluate the acute safety of Rg3-KRG in healthy adult volunteers using a 48hr symptoms questionnaire.

overall_official.affiliation: Risk Factor Modification Centre - St. Michael's Hospital

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the acute effect of Rg3-KRG on arterial stiffness in healthy adult volunteers, as measured by aortic augmentation index (AIx).
primary_outcome.time_frame: Two weeks (measurements taken on two separate  visits with minimum one week washout)

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the acute effect of Rg3-KRG on aortic and brachial blood pressure in healthy adult volunteers.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two weeks (measurements taken on two separate visits with minimum one week washout)

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Treatment
